channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Midwinter Avenue GL51 9JF Street lights, 3rd May
item.description:
The streetlight, no. 1 ; along with all of the other streetlights in Midwinter Avenue GL51 9JF have failed again. This is happening frequently now ( several times time in recent months) . Can you please repair ASAP. There are several disabled residents in this area and it is pitch-black at night.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 15, Midwinter Avenue, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole in outside lane of dual carriageway, 3rd May
item.description:
Outside lane of a417 just before Zoons Court roundabout coming from Barnwood towards Brockworth, under bridge.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brockworth Bypass, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain floods after rain (never fixed correctly on previous reports), 3rd May
item.description:
Drain is located on the road at the boundary between No. 10 & No. 12 Hall Road, Cheltenham, GL53 0HE

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 12, Hall Road, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Side of road is eroded - one giant long pot hole, 3rd May
item.description:
In between the turning for Great Witcombe and the house ‘The Landers’, as you are driving up Birdlip Hill. On the left side, this stretch of road has a long area where the road is eroded along the edge like a pothole. It forces traffic into the middle of the road and can cause problems for car going both ways
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ermin Way, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: No pavement for residents on a busy road., 3rd May
item.description:
Between Regency Court Park and Valley Park. A busy road link road between Cheltenham and Gloucester and cars do drive quite fast here. I've had cars swerve a couple of times last minute to avoid me in low lighting, due to no street lighting and no pavement.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bamfurlong Lane, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
